title: How to get a mobile screenshot from a PC - Quora

response.answer_text: If you have to take a screenshot on your smartphone then you must come. Today we tell you how you can get a smartphone screenshot directly from your PC. Use of Air Droid: You need to use an AirDroid application to take a screenshot directly from an Android smartphone on a PC. (More)

Select the device, click the Device menu, and select Screen capture. Use the Refresh button at the top of the window to take a new screenshot. Save the screenshot to an image file with the Save button or copy it to your clipboard with the Copy button.
